PersonalInformation.Fan: Grizzlies, Memphis Tigers, Liverpool FC, Borussia Dortmund
PersonalInformation.Mission Statement: Aspiring full-stack software engineer with a proven history of delivering seamless, optimized solutions through collaboration and innovation. I thrive in dynamic environments where creative problem-solving drives impactful results.

CloudServicesAndDeveloperTools: AWS (EC2, Lambda, S3, Athena, ElastiCache, SQS, RDS)

Details: Led team of 4 to deliver a 99% accurate, end-to-end inventory scanning system within 8 month deadline using React, Flask, PostgreSQL, AWS (EC2, S3, Athena), PyTorch, OpenCV, a DJI Matrice drone, and DJI’s Mobile SDK

Designed and implemented a portable Jetson Nano-based inventory scanning station for use in industrial settings using Django, OpenCV, Yolov8, Tesseract and restful HTTPS communications via AWS API Gateway to SAP APIs
Generalized the drone system at IFA beginning in Dec 2023 by using V-SLAM for localization and navigation with a custom 3D A* algorithm for dynamic, safe pathfinding during inventory scans
Developed full-stack solutions for Savvas Realize, a large-scale K-12 ed-tech platform, using Angular 16 micro front-ends, Apollo, GraphQL, RxJS, Spring, PostgreSQL, and Jest

Resolved 11 tickets across Agile sprints, such as optimizing GraphQL resolvers for batch data fetching and fixing accessibility issues within Angular UI components to meet WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards
Built an all-in-one Confluence knowledge hub, from new-dev onboarding guides to API sequence diagrams, improving team knowledge access and autonomy
Transitioned from a monolithic desktop app to a microservice web app using React, Django, PostgreSQL, and AWS services (EC2, Lambda, S3, Athena), enhancing system efficiency and scalability
Optimized API and query logic, utilizing AWS ElastiCache with in-memory data store for real-time data caching, reducing user load time by 23% (measured by AWS CloudWatch)
Containerized Python ETL tasks and credit scoring algorithms using Docker Containers, encapsulating isolated processes and minimizing single-point failures
Managed technical relationships with over 125 clients by translating technical features into tangible business benefits, leading to increased sales and enhanced customer engagement
Achieved a domain-high 23% year-over-year increase in customer retention by regular feedback sessions and personalized follow-ups, leading to stronger client relationships and satisfaction

Projects.Name: Brew AI-Powered Playlist Generator
Projects.Description: Cross-platform app that 'brews' a subjective user prompt then, using OpenAI's LLM, outputs a tailored music playlist. Showcases the ability to architect a cost and performance efficient, API-heavy development that contains a multi-layered web of API communications, ETLs, optimization algorithms, error handling and asynchronous programming.

PersonalStatement.Summary: A passionate technology enthusiast with a diverse range of interests from sports to music. Committed to leveraging my extensive tech skills to develop innovative solutions, while balancing a creative and active lifestyle.

Items.Name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect and further certificates

Music.BandGenre: Alternative, Punk, Grunge, Indie, Shoegaze, House, D&B, Dubstep, Trap

GamingAchievements.Rank: Top 10 overall in North America for 4 seasons

Sports.Soccer: Played competitive club soccer for all of my life through college, winning a couple state championships and going to national tournaments in Florida and Texas. Re-Founded the College of Charleston club soccer team, serving as captain for 2.5 years.
Sports.Tennis: Played up until high school, was ranked #3 in the state of Tennessee for my age group for a few years.

Activities.Description: Volunteer for Meals on Wheels in Memphis, TN - Delivering food to handicapped individuals around the city.

Activities.Organization: Big Brothers Big Sisters - Memphis, TN
Activities.Description: Provided after-school tutoring and mentorship to at-risk children in Memphis, TN - Whether it be helping with math homework or talking through tough situations.

Founded and managed Cleats4Charity - Performing city-wide sports equipment drives. The donations were then shipped to children across West Africa by L.A.C.E.S. I identified the absolutely massive seasonal turnover rate and waste of sports equipment, and positioned our organization to collect all of this unused sports equipment to give to kids who are in need. The joy it brought children and young adults in 3rd world situations was absolutely incredible.

I partnered the organization with L.A.C.E.S, who provides the infrastructure to effectively distribute sports equipment to kids in need, as handling all of the logistics and distribution was far, far out of my scope. They really allowed me to make the idea a reality. https://www.laces.org/

Our first year totaled: 3 tons (6613 lbs) of cleats, soccer balls, socks, shin guards, etc... distributed to many villages across West Africa.

FutureGoals.ShortTerm: Develop a cutting-edge tech project that combines AI and cloud computing. Software and networking in quantitative trading is also a focus.
FutureGoals.LongTerm: Lead a major tech initiative that makes a significant, positive impact on the industry and people's lives.

Experiences.Description: I've fished all over the world, from fly fishing, bass fishing to deep sea. Home waters are the rivers and streams around Brevard, NC. Not much beats catching a wild trout on a fly you designed and tied yourself.
Love back-country skiing trips or just casual resort days with friends.

BandAchievements.Achievement: I play drums. Made a band with some friends, mainly just as an outlet and for passion. Big influences are Smashing Pumpkins, Turnstile, Alice in Chains, Men I Trust, Bon Iver, Good Tiger, Half Moon Run, Local Natives, Foals, Soundgarden.

MemorableEvents.Event: Attended a Borussia Dortmund game in Germany
MemorableEvents.Experience: Fulfilling a lifelong dream of experiencing a live match of my favorite soccer team.
Experienced the electrifying atmosphere of a Premier League game at Anfield.

CateringCompany.Name: Salamander Catering
CateringCompany.Specialty: Specializing in Asian x Mexican x American street food fusion, balancing creativity with accessibility through powerful flavors.

Events.Role: Sharing insights on the latest trends in software development and system architecture, hanging out with other tech enthusiasts and sharing information. Always a good time.

Favorites.Description: Enjoying different types of beans/styles and flavors.
